subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The United States Anti-Doping Agency initiated a procedure against Lance Armstrong with a time frame for allegations that began in the 1990s and continued through 2010.
snippet: The United States Anti-Doping Agency initiated a procedure against Lance Armstrong with a time frame for allegations that began in the 1990s and continued through 2010.
